005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathExpression;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticMetapathException;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
021
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.stream.Stream;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026
027/**
028 * Provides new Metapath functions that evaluate a Metapath recursively over
029 * sequences generated by evaluating that expression.
030 */
031public final class MpRecurseDepth {
032  private static final String NAME = "recurse-depth";
033
034  @NonNull
035  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
036      .name(NAME)
037      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_EXTENDED)
038      .deterministic()
039      .contextDependent()
040      .focusDependent()
041      .argument(IArgument.builder()
042          .name("recursePath")
043          .type(IStringItem.class)
044          .one()
045          .build())
046      .returnType(INodeItem.class)
047      .returnZeroOrMore()
048      .functionHandler(MpRecurseDepth::executeOneArg)
049      .build();
050
051  @NonNull
052  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
053      .name(NAME)
054      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_EXTENDED)
055      .deterministic()
056      .contextDependent()
057      .focusIndependent()
058      .argument(IArgument.builder()
059          .name("context")
060          .type(INodeItem.class)
061          .zeroOrMore()
062          .build())
063      .argument(IArgument.builder()
064          .name("recursePath")
065          .type(IStringItem.class)
066          .one()
067          .build())
068      .returnType(INodeItem.class)
069      .returnZeroOrMore()
070      .functionHandler(MpRecurseDepth::executeTwoArg)
071      .build();
072
073  private MpRecurseDepth() {
074    // disable construction
075  }
076
077  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
078  @NonNull
079  private static ISequence<INodeItem> executeOneArg(
080      @NonNull IFunction function,
081      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
082      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
083      IItem focus) {
084
085    ISequence<INodeItem> initalContext = ISequence.of(FunctionUtils.requireType(INodeItem.class, focus));
086
087    ISequence<? extends IStringItem> arg = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
088    IStringItem recursionPath = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arg.getFirstItem(true));
089
090    return recurseDepth(initalContext, recursionPath, dynamicContext);
091  }
092
093  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
094  @NonNull
095  private static ISequence<INodeItem> executeTwoArg(
096      @NonNull IFunction function,
097      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
098      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
099      IItem focus) {
100
101    ISequence<INodeItem> initalContext = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
102
103    ISequence<? extends IStringItem> arg = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1)));
104    IStringItem recursionPath = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arg.getFirstItem(true));
105
106    return recurseDepth(initalContext, recursionPath, dynamicContext);
107  }
108
109  @NonNull
110  private static ISequence<INodeItem> recurseDepth(
111      @NonNull ISequence<INodeItem> initialContext,
112      @NonNull IStringItem recursionPath,
113      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
114    MetapathExpression recursionMetapath;
115    try {
116      recursionMetapath = MetapathExpression.compile(recursionPath.asString(), dynamicContext.getStaticContext());
117    } catch (MetapathException ex) {
118      throw new StaticMetapathException(StaticMetapathException.INVALID_PATH_GRAMMAR, ex.getMessage(), ex);
119    }
120
121    return recurseDepth(initialContext, recursionMetapath, dynamicContext);
122  }
123
124  /**
125   * Evaluates the {@code recursionMetapath} starting with the the items in the
126   * {@code initialContext} and also recursively using the resulting items
127   * returned by evaluating this path.
128   *
129   * @param initialContext
130   *          the sequence containing the initial node items to evaluate the
131   *          Metapath against
132   * @param recursionMetapath
133   *          the Metapath expression to use for recursive evaluation
134   * @param dynamicContext
135   *          the dynamic context supporting evaluation
136   * @return the Metapath node items resulting from the Metapath execution
137   */
138  @NonNull
139  public static ISequence<INodeItem> recurseDepth(
140      @NonNull ISequence<INodeItem> initialContext,
141      @NonNull MetapathExpression recursionMetapath,
142      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
143
144    return ISequence.of(ObjectUtils.notNull(initialContext.stream()
145        .flatMap(item -> {
146          @NonNull
147          ISequence<INodeItem> metapathResult = recursionMetapath.evaluate(item, dynamicContext);
148          // ensure this is list backed
149          metapathResult.getValue();
150
151          ISequence<INodeItem> result = recurseDepth(metapathResult, recursionMetapath, dynamicContext);
152          return ObjectUtils.notNull(Stream.concat(Stream.of(item), result.stream()));
153        })));
154  }
155}
